meanings.definition: Larger than the usual or normal size.
meanings.sent1: The outsize pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The outsize elephant stood out among the other animals.
meanings.sent3: The outsize ice cream cone towered over the little girl's head.
meanings.sent4: Her outsize laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The outsize waves crashed against the shore with tremendous force.

meanings.definition: An article of clothing that is larger than the standard size.
meanings.sent1: She had to special order an outsize dress for the event.
meanings.sent2: The store had a section dedicated to outsize clothing for plus-size customers.
meanings.sent3: The outsize sweater looked like a blanket on the petite man.
meanings.sent4: His outsize hat nearly covered his entire head.
meanings.sent5: The outsize shoes were a perfect fit for his big feet.
